judul: Python Logging: Using Logging in Python Applications
konten: Logging in Python allows you to record and manage log messages in your applications...

contoh.isi:
# Example of configuring and using logging
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')

logging.info('This is an informational message')
contoh.komentar: Configures and logs an informational message using Python's logging module.

topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan logging untuk merekam dan mengelola pesan log dalam aplikasi Python.

error.deskripsi: TypeError occurred due to passing incorrect data type to logging configuration.
error.solusi: Ensure correct data types are used for logging configuration options.

judul: Python Flask: Building Web Applications with Flask
konten: Flask is a lightweight and versatile framework for building web applications in Python...

contoh.komentar: Creates a basic Flask web application that responds with 'Hello, World!'

topik.topik: Pembuatan Aplikasi Web dengan Flask dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Flask untuk membangun aplikasi web ringan dan serbaguna dalam Python.

highlight: versatile framework for building web applications

error.deskripsi: ModuleNotFoundError occurred due to missing Flask module.
error.solusi: Ensure Flask is installed using 'pip install Flask'.
